app_descript:
Brief: autoTRADER.ca is Canada's trusted destination for buying and selling new and used cars. Loaded with features that help you gain insight into the car's value, read real owner reviews, and view CarProof reports, this mobile app bridges the gap between your car buying or selling needs and the perfect vehicle match. With real-time listing updates and a plethora of user-generated content, autoTRADER.ca is a comprehensive tool for anyone in the Canadian car market.
